solution_line_template: If {spots_on_upper_torso} is half the number of her spots, then she has {spots_on_upper_torso}*{half_multiplier}=<<{spots_on_upper_torso}*{half_multiplier}={total_spots}>>{total_spots} spots total.

If one-third of her spots are located on her back and hindquarters, then she has {total_spots}/{back_hindquarters_divisor}=<<{total_spots}/{back_hindquarters_divisor}={spots_on_back_hindquarters}>>{spots_on_back_hindquarters} spots located on her back and hindquarters.

If the reaming spots are located on her sides, then {total_spots}-{spots_on_upper_torso}-{spots_on_back_hindquarters}=<<{total_spots}-{spots_on_upper_torso}-{spots_on_back_hindquarters}={spots_on_sides}>>{spots_on_sides} spots are located on her sides.
